Name: Slingshot Adventure
About the game: Slingshot Adventure: is a classic 2D pixel art style game with shooting elements. FEEL the experience of facing waves of enemies that depended on all your skill to overcome. Guide the boy Ralph through different scenarios in search of his rewards. Challenge your accuracy against hordes of enemies. Dodge enemy attacks using the slide. Use scenery elements to your advantage. Collect items to advance in the game. * 2D Pixel Art. * Precise shooting, dodging and jumping.
